website_summaries.verdict: This option is comfortable and looks great, but it may not be as durable as other shirts.
pros: Material works well to block sun, and is quick drying
Well made, with a good look
cons: Sizing is a bit large and loose fitting
order down a size for a tighter fit

customer_reviews.title: I was undecided about whether to buy a large or ...
customer_reviews.text: I was undecided about whether to buy a large or an x-large for this shirt. I'm 6 ft tall, 205 lbs reasinably fit and evenly distributed. Anyway, it was definitely loose. I swam in it, snorkeled, rode a flow-rider, and went down water slides in it and the looseness didn't really hamper motion. So, I'd probably buy a large in the future, but going loose didn't cause any issues. I've attached a pic to help you see how the XL fits.
customer_reviews.author: Carl in BR

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit for the dad bod
customer_reviews.text: I am a roughly 5'11 190 lb man, I certainly do not consider myself fat but not really in shape either. I purchased another UV shirt in XL and it was skin tight so I had to return it. Reviews of this shirt as well as the photo led me to believe it was the loose fit I was looking for and they were correct! It's going to stick to you when wet, but anything will. It dried quickly and the fit was just right in a large. If this is useful please let me know by clicking the button below.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Pal

customer_reviews.title: Swim In Public!
customer_reviews.text: Big men with guts and man boobs - this is for you! Gives you a nicer look while in the water, clings tight when you first step out of the water, but pull it away from your body as you step out, and it pretty much stays pulled away so you can walk around without it stuck to you. It doesn't cling while you're swimming. It is difficult to find somewhat flattering swimwear for big guys, so I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous Consumer

customer_reviews.title: This super comfortable and fast drying swim shirt makes even the ...
customer_reviews.text: One reaches an age when weight and back hair may tend to scare little kids in the water. This super comfortable and fast drying swim shirt makes even the most unsightly of us at least presentable.
customer_reviews.author: Orrin C. Judd

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what to do?
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one of these I’ve purchased. Comfortable and nice for the sun. I thought with the first one it was my fault when I washed it, thus I got another a year later. Basically they become discolored and get random stains all over them after one wash. Wore mine all last week in Nevada, Air dried. Washed when I came home. Ruined. Same as last one. Not worth contacting customer support or Speedo because I know no one will respond. Pretty much junk unless you never plan on washing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beach/pool shirt
customer_reviews.text: Great swim shirt in the water to prevent sunburn. If you wear it swimming it does provide some drag. My husband in 6'2 and 220 and the x-large looks good on him and it's loose in the arms. It hasn't faded at all after washing a number of times for the summer. I would definitively purchase again. It can also just be worn as a tee shirt and it does dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart in 4-5 Uses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this men’s swim shirt on Amazon 6/1/19. The shirt completely fell apart after four or five uses. Unfortunately, the return window has closed and nothing can be done except to warn others to look elsewhere. Kind of disappointing from a brand that is supposed to be reputable (and a little pricey).
customer_reviews.author: CleanQueen

customer_reviews.title: Size down fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a large but after reading the reviews I went with the Medium and am glad I did, it fit perfect, not tight but not too baggy either. I didn't want too baggy because of the drag it would cause while swimming. I am 5'11 and 185lb and the medium fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: This shirt fits like a circus tent.
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is huge on me. I am a true Medium and this Medium shirt fits as if it were a L or XL. Unfortunately I was leaving on a vacation and had no time to replace it. But I would have been better off wearing a t-shirt for all the snorkeling I did. This shirt was so loose it was swimming all around me and got in the way. Now I'm stuck with this shirt I'll never wear again. Speedo needs to re-size these. Just make the Small a Medium, a Medium a Large, etc. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C

customer_reviews.title: Not for SCUBA
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I’ll preface this by saying that I own several pairs of Speedo brand swim trunks and they’re great. I bought this shirt hoping that I could use it as a rash shirt while SCUBA diving. After ten dives, the seams are holding up but the fabric itself has frayed where it came into contact with Velcro or something. The shirt looks and feels good, it does keep the sun off of my back and shoulders, but if you need a rash shirt for diving, this product will not hold together for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was looking for..
customer_reviews.text: great for Swimming been using it for about a month or so and it doesn't make you feel heavier when getting out of the water. Also it drys up pretty quick. Will buy again.. wanted something to wear since i wasn't feeling to confident to go shirtless in the pool.. ** Great for pool training and the beach ** True to size *** Great material (somewhat like under amour) **** Great for the $$$ ****** Drys quick At the moment I have No Cons for the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Rell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but poor UV protection and fabric quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my week long beach trip. I burn pretty easily and have a history of melanoma, so protection is important to me. I wore the shirt 3 different days and washed it twice, and it was hung to dry each time. However, multiple spots on the shirt are starting to pill and threads are hanging loose. Also, I got a mild burn on my chest after the first day wearing it, so I applied sunscreen underneath the shirt to prevent this from happening again. I've gotten much better results from cheap generic swim shirts at a certain big-box store chain and at half the price. I do not recommend this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: AdamMB91

customer_reviews.title: Stylish protection from the sun
customer_reviews.text: For those of you who sunburn easily, as I do, this shirt takes away a lot of worry while also looking stylish. It is not at all bothersome to swim in, and it dries quickly. Yes, it does stick to your skin as you are coming out of the water (as anything will), but you pull it away from your skin and all is well (it doesn't mold back to your skin). I'll happily wear this every time I swim. Haven't compared this to other products, but this was a brand I trust, having worn other products by them.
customer_reviews.author: Apollinaire

customer_reviews.title: Neck hole WAY TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 2XL and this is a 2XL but the neck hole on these are ENORMOUS. It sucks because when I go out in them and they get wet it stretches even more and a time or two after a wave crashes on me this thing is practically hanging off my shoulder on one side. I mean the fabric stretches it would be way better IMO to just have a smaller neck hole for a shirt that is intended to get wet as it will stretch. But if you are a 2XL you would have to have the neck the thickness of a Rhino to feel comfortable in this thing
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, but wear bandaids.
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are fantastic, but but waterproof bandages on your nipples.... Im 6’0” tall and 235 lbs. The XL fit nicely... not tight, but not a bag either. I returned the XXL because it fit like a bag. I bought 2 of these for a 2 week trip to the Bahamas and wore them nearly every day in and out of my the salt water. They keep the sun off, dry quickly, and do t stock too badly when wet. Nipples Started to hurt... so like a runner out bandaids on... problem solved. Highly recommend for water or just general all purpose outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: dtho

customer_reviews.title: Typical XL dude, stick with the true size
customer_reviews.text: Bought my hubby an XXL since he is a bigger-chested man and his suits are a 44, however his pants are a 36. (large muscular upper body with a beer belly). sometimes he will take a XXL in sweatshirts to have them roomy.. well this isn't one of those. he tried it on even to see if he should get a large! we decided to reorder the XL and see if it fits better. so.. DONT SIZE UP!
customer_reviews.author: Angelfadedblue

customer_reviews.title: Careful with the sizing
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'11 and 196lbs so wanted something loose around my stomach and was debating whether to get the medium or the large. I read the reviews and figured before I ordered, I'll order the medium, even though I thought I was probably a large but I was going to lose weight. Very glad I ordered the medium as if anything this is still a little on the large size, slightly larger than I would have liked but I'll still use it, it's loose around my neck but then I do have a thin neck, I'm happy with the purchase, if I do lose weight I might well order a small, as the style of the swim shirt is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chepito

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sun protection, and looks great too
customer_reviews.text: I'm 225 and 6'4" (and a bit overweight) and the large fit me comfortably. The XL was huge and I returned it. Wore the shirt about half of my trip to Kauai, both snorkeling and hiking, really good sun protection, and the shirt is lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, cool and fast drying
customer_reviews.text: Picked one of these up at a surf shop in Hawaii. I'm hooked! Got a bunch. So, so comfortable. Perfect for exercising in the hot Texas summers. Wicks sweat super-fast and keeps you cool. Also looks great. Be careful of abrasions ... the fabric can tear easily leaving a streak or 'run' kind of like in silk stockings. However, as long as you are not rolling around in the dirt, bailing off your longboard at high speed or bouncing around on a rock face, this speedo shirt will hold up well. Also great for camping as easy to wash and fast drying.
customer_reviews.author: K. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Quick Dry and Breathable
customer_reviews.text: The Speedo Men's UPF 50+ Easy Short Sleeve Rashguard Swim Tee is a great breathable and quick dry garment. It's cut generously and drapes nicely. The sizing is maybe a touch on the large size. I like the white piping. I paid $16.42 with free shipping. It's gone up to $19 and change at the time of this review however it's an easy decision and I would recommend this garment to others.
customer_reviews.author: raj from chicagoTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: stains very easily
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shirt - the look and feel and fit. But I have to echo what other reviewers have mentioned here. The shirt picks up the tiniest stains soooo easily. "Well, why did you buy a white shirt then?" Is the natural response. And I hear that. But I have other white shirts that didn't stain like this one. Something with the fabric that it picks up everything and makes it permanent. And yes, the armpits. So, the upshot is that I don't wear it as much as I would otherwise. Something for you to consider...
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dix

customer_reviews.title: Product As Described
customer_reviews.text: Usage: Swimming in Lakes and Ocean – Product held up through multiple swimming events. Fit: Product came and the fit was as described, I did not experience the size of the product running small at all. The XL was a true XL. Durability: As of about 3 washes and wear and tear from swimming, the seams held up and the logo did not flake off. After swimming it did not take long for the shirt to dry in the hot sun, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Little baggier than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I like zero details on sun shirts (designs) and had the sleeveless version. It’s kind of baggy more like a shirt than a rash-guard. I didn’t expect it to be surfer dude right but a little more fitted. And the sleeves are pretty long. Like the fabric and the color. Wanted it to be a little more form fitting but I use it at the beach and not for, say, fishing so it’s wet a lot. Good quality. Decent price. No designs :-)
customer_reviews.author: Edward Kidman

customer_reviews.title: good quality, me likey.
customer_reviews.text: So far, i am giving this 4 stars. Well made, no loose strings or blemishes. Fits like that size is supposed to fit, neither to loose nor to tight. Perfect length. Am wearing in an indoor therapy pool so i will never know about the uv protection. Do care about the fading. Have not been impressed with other brands i have purchased. If it keeps its color for at least 6 months, i will be happy. i thought Speedo would be pricey but it's not. At this point, after 3 wearings, i would definitely purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: cricket 4103

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for big guys
customer_reviews.text: I find some of these rash guards to have a fitted cut that is not flattering for me (I am at 2X-3X in most clothes). I bought a 2X and the fit was perfect. Roomy but not sloppy. Pretty flattering actually. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I was sent the wrong size and then the replacement was the wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Navy color in Large. They sent the correct colored shirt with a hang tag labelled "L" but the shirt was actually labelled size "M" on the collar and was too small. Oh well, a bad tag from Speedo isn't a big deal. I sent the medium shirt back. The replacement shirt just arrived and is the perfect size. Unfortunately, the replacement shirt is Black, not Navy. You win some, you lose some. I'm going to keep the black one, but caveat emptor. The shirt is high quality and seems to fit well. Amazon just needs to get it's bins sorted better.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L

customer_reviews.title: Good sun protection and great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shirt for my husband since we just moved to Florida and have a pool. He is an older guy and the shirt provides perfect sun protection without being too snug. The color was just what we wanted. Best of all it was a fraction of the price of some of the other sun protection shirts we looked at.
customer_reviews.author: A. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, definitely fits a little large
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, I've worn it a dozen times or so now in the pool, it works great and is very comfortable. The sizing is definitely on the large side, though that's to be expected as it's a loose fit. I ordered a size smaller than I normally would for a swim shirt and couldn't be happier with it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt, true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 shirts from Amazon to try on. I'm 5'9 185 pounds. This was by far and away the best and most comfortable. I ordered the XL, and it's exactly what I was looking for. It's loose, but not like a tent, the sleeves are a bit longer (just above the elbow) and it's very comfortable. Looks great, feels great, it's all the other brands I tried to shame. I'll be ordering a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Paris

customer_reviews.title: Order down a size
customer_reviews.text: The product description said this is intended to be a loose fit and if you wanted a snug fit to go down a size. I ordered actual size (M) for a loose fit. The shirt is huge and fits like an XL. I would advise going down a size. Also, I ordered the navy and it is actually almost black when dry and black when wet. The shirt is comfortable, lightweight, and offers good sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L. Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice but Watch out on the Size
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is very light and comfortable. Great for being out in the summer heat. Just beware the shirt is sized approx. 1/2 size larger than normal shirts I typically wear. I always take a large and this shirt seems to be in between a Large and Extra Large. I ordered a Medium in the Long Sleeve version of this and it fits me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: SHS92

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Great if you are in the water a lot and don’t like wearing sunscreen. I bought mine for our Hawaii vacation where we went snorkeling almost every day. Having this shirt saved my back. As an added bonus, I didn’t pollute the pristine waters with some toxic sunscreen. Be aware that some sunscreens are harmful to the marine life. There is plenty of literature on the matter.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V

customer_reviews.title: I like a loose fit but really?
customer_reviews.text: There's enough room for an extra half a person in this shirt! I ordered the large for my son because he needed it asap and we did not have the time to send it back or go out shopping for another shirt. Very loose fit, floppy and thin. He is happy because he couldn't care less if he swam in a sack.
customer_reviews.author: Iris74

customer_reviews.title: The Best Big Man's Rashguard I've Found Yet -- Speedo Men's Easy S/S Swim Tee Rashguard / Big Sizes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a rather large man, 62yr and a large amount of belly fat has taken over where my abs used to be. When looking for rashguards to coverup this body I was pleasantly surprised to find a name brand I trusted offering a product in the size and fit (a more loose/relaxed fit) rather than just a fit for the lean, mean surfer boys. It fits nicely and doesn't ride up whether swimming or doing water exercise. Fast drying, easily laundered, still looks and fits like new. If you are a big guy looking for a rashguard you can't go wrong with this Speedo Men's Easy S/S Swim Tee Rashguard.
customer_reviews.author: GrD_28

customer_reviews.title: Deteriorated after 1 wash
customer_reviews.text: Beware buying any clothes on Amazon as my personal experience is always a let down. It happened again with this shirt after 1 wash a line started appearing in middle front and now is coming apart with a hole. Very poorly made and it seens Amazon only sells seconds or damaged clothes.
customer_reviews.author: BOne

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved this
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a shirt to go into the pool with. The fit was comfortable and perfect. He hasn't used it yet but he will in about a week. He is 5'10", 220 pounds with a big stomach. I bought the 2X and it fit perfect and he at least liked the way his stomach looked in it. He also noted that it was polyester an that is why it feels so light
customer_reviews.author: SSloan

customer_reviews.title: runs a bit big
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a large and this felt a tad big. I haven't used it at the beach yet, but this does have a nice breathable feel. I plan on wearing this to snorkel with a snorkel vest; so, I don't mind that it is a bit big. I am mostly concerned about getting a back sunburn or having to continually apply sunscreen while snorkeling. I thought that this would be a good option. I am not sure it will be worth +$25 yet.
customer_reviews.author: I. Davila

customer_reviews.title: Great swim tee!
customer_reviews.text: Most don't give reviews that actually help so here's my "hopefully" helpful review. I am 6'2 , 200lbs with a slightly athletic build and I bought the large which has plenty of room to spare. I wanted a little extra room so this works for me but if you want it a little tighter size down. Nice light, soft material and kept me burn free where it was covering.
customer_reviews.author: CursiveA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for  water activities
customer_reviews.text: Looking for additional protection from the Florida sun and this rash guard was fantastic. It wears well and cools as it drys. After several days in the water, we were completely protected. The shirt did not restrict any movement and did cling when wet. We plan on purchasing another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Reanna

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt
customer_reviews.text: I needed a swim shirt for the rest of my foreseeable swim life as I have had 2 surgeries on my abdomen leaving unsightly scars. This shirt is extremely comfortable, cost effective for a name brand, and does the job perfectly. I can say goodbye to lathering a ton of sunscreen on my body too.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I got the XL thinking it would shrink, it did not but extremely comfortable, I like the color and it dries pretty quickly once out of the pool/lake. I’m as Irish as the day is long so instead of turning pink/purple during a day at the beach this helps me manage my sunburns. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Patrick E. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful due to the fact that it stains terribly when in contact with sunscreen. My husband put sunscreen on his neck and arms. The shirt turned yellow/orange where it made contact with his skin. The whole idea of a UV shirt is to guard against damaging rays, but after a vacation in the sun, the shirt looks like a ten year old dirty t shirt! Embarrassing! Sorry! Great idea, good fit, comfortable, but WHITE is not the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: girlteacher

customer_reviews.title: Its a great swim shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Nice loose fit. Its IS good quality and does its job. My one complaint is it tends to catch on things easily and leave little frayed tear lines. I have a couple frays in the stomach area now just from carrying things against it. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ragz

customer_reviews.title: I'm Irish so I burn easy and had no issues with these shirts
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a tropical vacation I just got back from. My wife was tired of me hitting the beach in a t-shirt with the sleeves cut off. I'm Irish so I burn easy and had no issues with these shirts. I'm a big guy....325 lbs @ 6 ft and these fit better then some of the others I've bought. Only complaint is the neck hole is a little too big and it wish it was a little looser at the waist area but still a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Tje Most Encouraging Shirt I Own!
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. The sizes run large. The one I purchased was probably a size larger than a t shirt of the same size, even more after it got wet. Unless o dropped that many pounds after my first time back in the pool. In that case, this is the most encouraging shirt I own!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Loose
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and dad, they fit well and protect from the sun. They are loose like the description says, I would think you could size down one and it still wouldn't be too tight.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Great rash guard shirt
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Speedo rash guard shirt for the beach and it worked great keeping the sun from burning me or giving me any rashes. Also speedo is a trustworthy brand with swim wear so that was a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Skin Protection
customer_reviews.text: This shirt worked great for my husband who has fair skin and burns while in the sun. The shirt protected him while swimming or sitting in the sun. Would definitely recommend this product to others. The shirt dries quickly and was not fitted on the body.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Material much thinner than last year's purchased at dept. store.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one in navy blue at a Dept. store last year. Like it very much. Saw Amazon had them when I wanted another in a different color. Ordered and received the gray one and it fits similar to my first one. However, the material is much thinner and wrinkles easily unlike my first one which is just better quality. So, disappointed in theone from Amazon and would not buy another. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Swim Tee
customer_reviews.text: I've never worn a swim tee before, so decided to try both a Speedo and a Kanu for comparison. The Kanu is OK, but the Speedo is the hands down winner for fit and comfort. While both were a bit larger than expected, the Speedo was closer to its stated size. The material was also much smoother against my skin than Kanu, which had a slightly rough texture (ie, not comfortable if you have a sunburn). While Kanu is the cheaper alternative, I'll buy Speedo again for its better fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Dad

customer_reviews.title: Burn free! Extra layer of protection!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother as we were going to universal studios volcano bay for the weekend. My brother lives in Ohio so his skin is ultra sensitive. He still used SPF 50 and really reapplied throughout the day but wore this shirt at the water park and did not get burned. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Zocolo

customer_reviews.title: Nice for big dudes. Thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I'm a big dude and almost hides the fat rolls and bigger man chest. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Armando Segura

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and look!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a swim shirt mainly to protect from the sun while boating on the lake and this shirt does the trick. I'm 6'1 210 and the xl fit me perfect. Very lightweight, fast drying, and just a good looking shirt. White was great as I wanted something cool!
customer_reviews.author: H. Scott Sleighter

customer_reviews.title: Nice rash guard
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a large but after reading the reviews I ordered a medium. I first I thought it was a little too tight but kept it anyway. After wearing it a few times it now is just the right amount of “loose.” Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: lvnvrcd

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is living up to expectations so far. I have worn it out in the sun for a few hours at a time and have not gotten a sunburn underneath it. I would say the fit is right as it should be. My only qualm is that it doesn't seem to dry as quickly as some other dri-fit shirts I have.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Prevents Sunburns
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for my son. He is fair skinned and burns easily. My son was going whitewater rafting and would not be able to reapply sunblock during the trip. The shirt prevented him from getting a sunburn. I am highly satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie K

customer_reviews.title: Don't order white, it stains from sunblock
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, it fits well, and blocks the sun. I ordered the color white and it stains easily with sunblock. Around the neck it turns brown, which does not come out in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Queens_NY Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great swim shirt!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby usually wears an XXL, and can be self-conscious sometimes when it comes to swim shirts. This swim shirt made him feel comfortable and confident about himself while swimming. He also looked very attractive in this swim shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Carson Teal

customer_reviews.title: I did not like this shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I have one other Speedo sun shirt rash guard that was bought at the big box C Store. THIS was not like that shirt. This one was itchy and not comfortable to wear. It was an odd feeling shirt. It fit like other XXLs but was not comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Careful not to get dirty, otherwise will have permanent stains.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a great shirt, until found out that if you get anything dirty on it, a permanent stain will remain, which is disappointing. Otherwise everything else was fine.
customer_reviews.author: jhuffman

customer_reviews.title: Holding up nicely. Good quality material and it is nice and ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my son- he has worn it a couple times now and it has been washed once. Holding up nicely. Good quality material and it is nice and loose fitting (which is what he wanted). He's a big kid- about 6 feet tall- 210 lbs.(and still growing) and it is a little big- we probably could have gone with a size Large, but it isn't so big that it needed to be sent back. Don't want him outgrowing it before the end of summer!
customer_reviews.author: SRyan

customer_reviews.title: Good for UV protection - but runs large
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt for UV protection instead of sunscreen on chest and back. Sizing a bit large (XL is bigger than Nike shirts), also a bit heavy, but this may be necessary for UV protection.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago-Scott

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. However, if you want a snug fit, you'll need to size down. I got a small for my son based on reviews. Even though he usually wears a medium, this small was really loose and long on him. Great swim shirt, though.
customer_reviews.author: Internetshoppingjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length, provides great protection, and washes well after getting dirty. I’ve tried many brands and this has been my favorite. Will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Caley G

customer_reviews.title: Solid Rash Guard for Girthy Gents
customer_reviews.text: Solid shirt. True to size and a looser than the skin tight ones that fat bastards like myself should not legally be allowed to wear in public. Only knocks are it’s not great looking and the fabric is kind of rough, not super comfy. But it gets the job done well enough that I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: VRF

customer_reviews.title: Consider going with one size down
customer_reviews.text: A really nice swim shirt. Speedo cut it slightly roomy so that it does not bind; i.e.: same fit as the Speedo Longview swim shirt. If you are on the cusp between Medium and Large, then go with medium.
customer_reviews.author: VeloTraveller

customer_reviews.title: Sleek cool comfort
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift. True to size with a modern fit. Sleek cool comfort with the bonus of swim and sun protection. Dries quick so can be worn from ocean to boardwalk with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Ohiopearl

customer_reviews.title: Size runs a bit large
customer_reviews.text: I love this swim shirt, but the size was a bit larger than expected. Also, the shirt absorbs water a lot more than expected and is very heavy when saturated. This is the first one I bought, so maybe that is normal.
customer_reviews.author: plantman

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt to wear on a white water rafting trip as it offered more protection and sun blocking than a normal shirt, and I had hopes it would dry more quickly. I ordered an XL and usually wear an XL-T or XXL. The fit was as expected, fit like a normal t-shirt and didn't looks ridiculous with my spare tire. Unfortunately, the "drys twice as fast" part was complete nonsense. It doesnt really dry any more quickly than a normal shirt. Not really what I had hoped for in a shirt made specifically for use in water.
customer_reviews.author: 762x51

customer_reviews.title: Rash guards for trip
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband and boys. 1 XL and 2 Mediums. One of my boys said it gave them a rash. They all got definite protection from the sun since we were snorkeling. They were a generous fit for all three.
customer_reviews.author: B  Yourself

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy the color white!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, in white, for our vacation. He wore it twice, I washed as directed and it’s covered in yellow and brownish stains all over!! The company will not return my emails to return this product!! I will say, it does work, he didn’t get burnt. Maybe the other colors don’t stain, but it’s not worth it to try!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rose

customer_reviews.title: no suntan lotion!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first time my husband wore this to the beach suntan lotion stained neck and arms. Can not get the stain out. Need to return...very very disappointed.What good is a 50 spf shirt if you cant put on lotion and walk the Florida beaches.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Giglia

customer_reviews.title: Great swim and/or workout shirt
customer_reviews.text: Bought several of these for husband who prefers to wear swim shirts and uses them outdoors for walking in warm/hot weather. Very lightweight and comfortable, he has used for several months and they have washed well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Sizing the only (minor) issue, otherwise a perfect top for the beach or pool
customer_reviews.text: The top was purchased for sun protection while at the beach, boating and watersports, and generally for time on the beach, swimming and hanging around the pool during a pacific islands holiday. Reasonably quick to dry. Oerall it was absolutely perfect. If I had a criticism it would be the sizing is somewhat 'generous' but not so much as to be a problem (I am normally XL and ordered accordingly. The top was generally loose, but not baggy, and I expect I probably could have fitted a Large better).
customer_reviews.author: 777Lobster

customer_reviews.title: One wash and the threads come loose all over
customer_reviews.text: Loved this shirt - wore it once for water sports, however after a single wash, the threads have come loose all over the tee. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to swim in
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to swim in, but the white really got dingy after just a couple of uses where I did not go that crazy with spray lotion on my extremities. I would definitely get a color that was a bit more forgiving. It kept me free of sunburn in some challenging aquatic conditions, though, so worhwhile for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Dane5015

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speedo shirt. Color looks great. Size was bigger that expected buy perfect fit. Quality was pretty good for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Lokesh Mohan

customer_reviews.title: Size down!
customer_reviews.text: This runs large -i normally wear medium in t shirts, but ordered a small and it fits like a medium. Loose fitting as stated, but comfortable. For reference, im about 5'11" and 155-160lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: No durability...
customer_reviews.text: After one use and washing on gentle cold cycle, shirt appears to have snags in it. Reading other's reviews I see that this is not an isolated incident. Very disappointed in the quality of the product. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Beach
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect shirt to wear at the beaches. It also prevents me from having to rub chemicals like sun block or repellent on my body. I will buy more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Monster Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great swim shirt !!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality swim shirt !! It was slightly big but I like it a little loose. So if fit perfectly for me. The price was great too. To get a shirt of that quality I definitely would of paid more in the store.
customer_reviews.author: jschreff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pasty guys like me.
customer_reviews.text: The size large fit me really well. I'm 6'1" and about 185, pretty fit. Looks excellent and keeps me from burning to crisp whenever I chance upon a dreaded patch of sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Rawr!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wear these sun shirts while vacationing in Hawaii. They are extremely comfortable, have a loose fit which I like since I wear them for hours. They dry quickly, and are comfortable in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: A good quality shirt
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and it's comfortable, lightweight, dries quickly, fits as expected. Purchased a medium and is a little loose around the middle. If you like tight fitting garment buy size smaller. Very vibrant color and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: asam

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Wore it once got a pull washed it has a hole. Not durable Washed it a second pull Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F Lauro

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for my tropical vacation!
customer_reviews.text: Needed some sun/reef protection for a trip to Maui. This was perfect. Hiked and swam and snorkeled without any issue. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up for very long.
customer_reviews.text: It did the job during my trip to Maui and kept me from getting burned, but it's got a discoloration spot on it already that looks like rust that never washed out. The stitching is also looking a little beat up already. Didn't hold together as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Swim Shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Husband very pleased with the fit of this shirt as well as the generous length. Would purchase again! Worth the few $ more in price over the KANU Surf we also purchased. Read KANU Surf review notes for comments.
customer_reviews.author: Fanelda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This fits true to size and worked great when I went to the Bahamas. Didn’t get burnt like I normally do.
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Braithwaite

customer_reviews.title: Good UPF 50+ swim tee / rash guard
customer_reviews.text: Size is on the loose side, and that's what I was looking for. It's roomy so it doesn't make every bit of your skin noticable when wet as some tighter swim tees does. It looks good, has UPF protection and dries fast and can also be worn as an active tee.
customer_reviews.author: Joao Torquato

customer_reviews.title: Good but the Speedo logo came off
customer_reviews.text: My husband liked this rashguard because it wasn't tight. A few Amazon members were nice enough to answer my questions about the fit -- I ordered a medium based on their advise. In other rashguards, a large was super tight and we returned them, this guard fits like a t-shirt. The only reason that I won't give it a 5 star rating is because after being in the pool for less than an hour, the logo on the front of the shirt peeled off. The rest of the shirt holds up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Christinex2x2

customer_reviews.title: Worked, fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Husband wore this in the pool a few times. It seemed to protect his shoulders where he didn't wear sunscreen. Washed ok, fit as stated.
customer_reviews.author: KDEL

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality. extremely light. will Purchase other shirts in multiple colors in the near future
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Size Inconsistant
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the granite color in size L and it was perfect (I normally wear XL T-shirts) but I sent it back for the black one. The black one was also size L but it was so small I couldn't even wear it. This is why people hate clothes shopping, it should of been exactly the same...
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get burned at all this summer. Fits as expected. Looks enough like a normal shirt that could wear it for hours before or after swimming
customer_reviews.author: Tim H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect swim shirt for summer on the lake
customer_reviews.text: This swim shirt has been great for my husband. It is light and doesn’t ride up in the water.
customer_reviews.author: RieW

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence between a Medium and Large. I'm 5' 9" tall about 185 lbs with some excess baggage around my waist, and am always in no-mans-land with shirts fitting correctly. I got a Medium and it definitely runs big as everyone else has said. It fits great dry and I'll be using it this weekend at a 4th pool party.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Apicella

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my 72 year old husband and he likes it! Very flattering and comfortable. Great for the pool this summer. I got an XL and it fits perfectly .
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great & Protects from the Sun
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son loves this water shirt. It protects his skin great- no sunburns! It looks nice on him and covers his belly well--good length and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I’m 6’2” and 215 lbs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I’m 6’2” and 215 lbs. I was looking for something to wear to a water park with my family. Since I’m not the most in shape man right now, this was a perfect swim shirt. They do run large. I bought an L and an XL and the L fits great. So whateve size you wear, get one size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN J HOYT

product_meta.title: Speedo Men's UV Swim Shirt Short Sleeve Loose Fit Easy Tee
product_meta.description: Long days in the water will be no problem with a hard-working rash guard that blocks the sun's rays. This short-sleeve version is enhanced with a Block the Burn UPF50+ finish and is quick drying for easy pool-to-lounging transitions.
feature_bullets: QUICK-DRYING: Low-moisture absorbtion for fast comfort right out of the water
DURABLE: Long-lasting soft and durable fabric makes this rashguard last swim after swim without losing shape or quality
LOOSE FIT: Looser-fitting rash guard (For a tighter fit, purchase one size smaller than your normal size)
UV & UPF 50+ PROTECTION: UV Block the Burn with UPF 50+ protective fabric
